name: Alarmed!
description:
[Maded for Ludum Dare 50 - 'Delaying the Inevitable' (interpretation: delaying when the alarm will go off)]

You're a thief trying to rob the biggest bank vault in town, but you need to disarm the alarm before it goes off, which becomes a difficult task when carrying all that money! Try to get as many coins as you can!

TOOLS USED:

  • [CODE] Unity 2020.3.29f1
  • [ART] Aseprite  1.2.34.1
  • [SFX] BFXR
  • [SFX]Audacity
  • [Music] Bosca Ceoil
